data.name: Intruders into 3 Family
data.description:
We have a family called "three" where the family is divisible by 3. So, intruders from five family entered three family secretly. So they need a spy to save their family. 

As a spy, your task is to remove the intruders i.e '5' and check, is it a three family or not. If it belongs to three family return the family without intruders in it else return -1.

Examples of 3 family are [.....,-12,-9-6,-3,0,3,6,9,12,......]


Examples:

n = 3 => 3

n = 55 => -1  
55 cannot be in family of three's

n = -55 => -1  
After removing intruders from -55 we have nothing but '-' which is not the family of three's, so return -1. 

n = 6553 => 63  
After removing intruders from 6553 we have 63 which is divisible by 3. simple right ;-)

n = 956451 => -1

for more examples check testcases.

NOTE : 0 is also considered to be in the family of 3.   

HAPPY CODING :-)
